name: DailyInterestingThing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Interested in random facts and topics of discussion? Enable this skill to get some really interesting stories in your daily flash briefing. This skill will only update once per day to provide you with a new interesting thing!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
